text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] Bigu: «Liʙos [-u zinatho]e-ro ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi ʙandagonas padid ovarda va [hamcunin] ruzihoi pokizaro ci kase harom kardaast?». Bigu: «In [ne'matho] dar zindagii dunjo ʙaroi kasonest, ki imon ovardaand, [va agar ci kofiron niz az onho ʙahramandand] ruzi qijomat maxsus [-i mu'minon] xohad ʙud. Mo incunin ojot [-i xud]-ro ʙaroi guruhe, ki medonand, ʙa tafsil ʙajon mekunem
